alert.note: Alert for Volusia (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 23 at 2:30PM EDT until July 23 at 3:00PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 300 PM EDT FOR NORTH CENTRAL VOLUSIA COUNTY... At 229 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Ormond Beach, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Daytona Beach, Ormond Beach, Holly Hill, Ormond-By-the-Sea, Daytona Beach Shores and Ormond Beach Airport. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
